name: Bandit Simulator
description:
Bandit Simulator is a unique game connecting players with the medieval world you didn't know before.
Create a bandit team and explore a totally different fight system like nowhere else :)

You are able to use skills like :
- Ball kick!
- Quick and slow steal!
- Power of Beer!
- and of course a lot of others ...



Build your crime empire and spread your influence across the world.
Create ambushes and escape from your enemies if needed ;)
It is almost like being a pirate but better.
Anyway, the world is in your filthy hands - it's your decision what to do next with it.
And if you have diarrhoea - then the mission can be a lot more difficult, not only for you but for your companion too.

The game would give you a different approach to NPC and NPC can have a different approach to you.
Probably the only game that gives you the possibility of making the dragon drunk ... that's the one way of having his gold.
